Hearts can not fail to be touched by the story of the atonement. As you learn the meekness and lowliness of Christ, you will know what you 
35
should say to the people; for the Holy Spirit will tell you what words to speak. Those who realize the necessity of keeping the heart under the control of the Holy Spirit, will be enabled to sow seed that will spring up unto eternal life. This is the work of the evangelistic canvasser.
